What are the treatments for sialidosis ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of sialidosis:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Sialidosis type I  - Genetic Testing Registry: Sialidosis, type II  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Ascites  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Hydrops Fetalis   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health
